editorialSummary.text: Casual roadside hotel offering compact rooms, international dining & free breakfast.

text.text: Good food , good service . Price a bit high compared to Other road side AC restaurant but was compensated by the cordial staff and great service .... food was freshly prepared and very tasty. We stopped only for lunch . Didn't stay here. Bar is alongside the restaurant

text.text: My experience was a little bad because the tv and the land line was not working there. And the room was ok but I saw a bad Habit of staffs that after knocking door they enter the room like a bullish condition I mean very hurried up they are at that time. Not even ask for permission to enter the room no matter they are for food service or something else, they should ask for permission before entering room. And afterall at the time of checkout, after making the bill and after my payment to them the receptionist said a staff to check the room . That was very bad experience, I'm 23 so I think I was not hesitate on this but I'm sure if a aged person was there he must showed the anger to the staff/receptionist. Thank you and I'll go again to see whether my experience can be changed or not..

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at and I must say that my experience was exceptional.  From the warm welcome at check-in to the impeccable service throughout my stay, every aspect exceeded my expectations.

The comfortable and well-appointed room, along with the attention to cleanliness and hygiene, made my stay truly enjoyable. The hotel's staff members were courteous, accommodating, and went above and beyond to ensure that all my needs were met.

The dining experience was delightful with a diverse and delicious selection of meals and the complementary breakfast was truly satisfying. I particularly appreciated it.

Overall, I'm thoroughly impressed by the level of professionalism and hospitality exhibited by everyone at all. My stay was nothing short of memorable, and I look forward to returning in the future.

Thank you for providing such a wonderful experience.

Warm regards,
CA Sarbeswar Subudhi

text.text: Location is good. Rooms are ok. We have just checked in and waiting for dinner so shall share views on food later on. Apparently the staff behaviour felt good but sooner a incident made us feel how bad is the customer service. We had taken three rooms 203, 204 and 205. Accidentally tea got spilled and there was a spot on bedsheet. I informed immediately to hotel staff who came and said that we need to pay Rs 4000 for it. How pathetic. We need number of the owner to discuss.

text.text: We have just checked into the hotel & ordered for tea. The tea accidentally spilled on the bedsheet causing strain, the hotel is demanding INR 4000/-, when we wanted to negotiate, we were told we could be exempted but in that event the poor housekeeping guy will have to compensate. The overall behaviour was found weird. We expected better treatment & more accommodotating attitude. Would be helpful if someone can share the phone number of the owner/MD.

The room was so wrecked bathroom had no lock, no exaust, broken door, wires coming out of electrical board, AC didn't gave remote, fan wasn't working with regulator, used bed sheet, stinking comforter, bathroom flush broken. Dirty floors, I mean infact they closed main electricity supply as well from early morning. I mean there was nothing good.

text.text: One of the worst hotels I have seen/stayed, I travel a lot and have to stay in remote places and I know what I am talking about. No electricity, no water, unhygienic bathroom, rooms with mould growing on walls, dirty bedsheets, cockroachs in the room, fruit fly all over inside the room... Overall a complete disaster. BTW I forgot to mention I took their best room "Presidential suite". Road noise is so much you rather sleep in your car it will be more clean, comfortable, quite.

text.text: Good infrastructure but required to develop in hospitality and food services areas.

text.text:
Stayed here for 3 days for business purpose. The hotel is located on a highway and doesn't have any nearby activities. Its quite far from city. So not suitable for family stays. But quite comfortable for business travelers. I was initially sceptical to stay in this hotel after reading lot of bad reviews. But the experience was completely different. Rooms are good and comfortable. But can improve on the maintenance especially the walls and bathroom. Since the room given to me was not occupied for quite few days, could feel the damp smell initially. But not to complain. Few amenities in the room like TV, few lights were not functioning. The USP of this hotel is their food and the service. Lip smacking food served hot either at your room or at the restaurant. They do have a wide spread menu (I preferred to choose local food to be on a safer side). Lift is available. But wasn't working. Parking is limited to 6 cars and is a open parking. As the hotel is located in the vicinity of highway, the rooms can become sometimes noisy.

Would I prefer to stay here again? Yes if I travel for business purpose.

text.text: Basically the hotel was good and the behaviour of all staff is kind.

originalText.text: Basically the hotel was good and the behaviour of all staff is kind.

text.text: It is one of the oldest hotels in Bhadrak. Rooms are standard. You can have a budget stay. Don't expect luxury. Service is ok. Location is the main plus point. It's is situated in the main market, so everything is within walkable distance. Since it is in the middle of the vegetable market, it is always over crowded. The vegetable vendors are sitting in the front of the hotel. So there is no parking space. Sometimes not even a single four wheeler can be parked ðŸ˜‰. Coming to the restaurant, the food is also budget oriented. The food tastes good, the rate is good. Ambience is normal. There is no thali. It's ala carta but don't have a fixed menu. Chicken kassa, pohola macha curry, macha besar taste is very good. Good for lunch and dinner. Usually crowded in the lunch time.

originalText.text: It is one of the oldest hotels in Bhadrak. Rooms are standard. You can have a budget stay. Don't expect luxury. Service is ok. Location is the main plus point. The vegetable vendors are sitting in the front of the hotel. So there is no parking space. Sometimes not even a single four wheeler can be parked ðŸ˜‰. Coming to the restaurant, the food is also budget oriented. The food tastes good, the rate is good. Ambience is normal. There is no thali. It's ala carta but don't have a fixed menu. Chicken kassa, pohola macha curry, macha besar taste is very good. Good for lunch and dinner. Usually crowded in the lunch time.

text.text: Superb hotel. The hotel manager Ranjan babu is a nice, very helpful person. He is a superb human being. There is a restaurant on the ground floor. The food is also very good. All the staff are really good and helpful. Completely safe and secure place to saty. I really enjoyed my stay here. I would strongly recommend this hotel 10 out of 10. Thank you so much Ranjan babu for your help
